product_name: REI Lyra Sleeping Bag - Long - Women's - Special Buy
long_description: With great performance at a reasonable price, this long 3-season sleeping bag offers extra insulation, extra length and a women-specific shape designed to keep you warm in the backcountry.
short_description: With great performance at a reasonable price, this long 3-season sleeping bag offers extra insulation, extra length and a women-specific shape designed to keep you warm in the backcountry.
